channel.title: Popularity on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Popularity on Ian Wootten

item.title: Why I Choose Popular Frameworks
item.description: I feel compelled to write this post so late in the day after clocking Tyler Renelle’s rant on github about his problems with the popularity of certain JS frameworks (in the main Backbone.js). After having written apps in a variety of JS frameworks (Backbone, Spine and Meteor), I’ve learned that the feature set of a framework is not the only thing I hold dear when making a choice between them.
